summary: A comprehensive test suite for the core components of the Moto library, covering account ID resolution, authentication, backend management, URL handling, configuration, decorators, Docker integration, EC2 metadata, region validation, proxy settings, request mocking, response processing, server operation, and utility functions.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and reliability of Moto's core mocking infrastructure to ensure developers can safely simulate AWS services during testing and development, thereby reducing dependence on real AWS resources and preventing regressions.
